nodes.text: The Silver Forest of Dreams was a forest located on the planet Kubindi that was made up of kilometer-tall silver trees that had 20-meter-wide leaves. During the fall, the leaves would fall to the ground and looked like giant rafts. A mist would shroud the forest which would reduce visibility. While difficult to navigate, the area was said to be beautiful from above, where it had the appearance of a huge field of glass shards caressed by a soft, diffusing mist.
The forest was home to many ghost spiders, which made traveling through it dangerous because of the many webs woven between the trees.
The place was rumored to be a nexus for the dark side of the Force.
